activities: We receive, store and process personal data from prospective customers that enter this information into our website and from the employees of our business customers and business partners within the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland for purpose of: (i) providing the registration process for our products and services, (ii) user verification, (iii) marketing and advertising of our products and services to current and prospective customers that have provided us with personal data, and (iv) providing customer support and service.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and prospective customer data and business partner data
recoursemech: Private third party dispute resolution mechanism provided by TRUSTe.
